Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously designed and crafted to exceed expectations. This unique item is not just a product; it's an experience tailored to elevate your lifestyle. Considering its exceptional quality and the time invested in its creation, I propose a price of $200 for it. This offer allows you to enjoy all the benefits this product has to offer without compromising on value. I believe you'll find it worth every penny. Let me know if you have any questions or if you're interested in making this purchase. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $200. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $200
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $100
